# Where do I get all the data from?

### OONI (Web Connectivity and Circumvention Tool)
https://api.ooni.io/apidocs/

### ACCESS NOW STOP
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1DvPAuHNLp5BXGb0nnZDGNoiIwEeu2ogdXEIDvT4Hyfk/edit#gid=798303217

### TOR (relay data records number of active users on the Tor Network)
https://metrics.torproject.org/userstats-relay-country.html

### Cloudflare Radar
IP Version
https://developers.cloudflare.com/api/operations/radar-get-http-timeseries-group-by-ip-version

TLS Version
https://developers.cloudflare.com/api/operations/radar-get-http-timeseries-group-by-tls-version

More data could be explored in Radar

### Apple censorship data
We can get this data from the team using Mangodb Queries. This is only apple store censorship data and not android 
https://applecensorship.com/

### CAIDA IODA 
https://www.caida.org/projects/ioda/
Worth exploring further

### Country Transit Influence (CTI) 
https://github.com/CAIDA/mapkit-cti-code
Can we deploy and capture this monthly? and use as part of our fragmentation index and shape analysis?


### Data localisation and data privacy restrictions
https://www.dlapiperdataprotection.com/
Could something like this be useful to us?
